name: player-pilot
title: Player Pilot
description: A comprehensive media player controller supporting multiple players with grid view, metadata display, and customizable player filtering.
author: dagimg-dot

commands.name: player-pilot
commands.title: Player Pilot
commands.subtitle: Control multiple media players with grid view
commands.description: View and control all your media players in a beautiful grid interface. Supports filtering by specific players, shows metadata, and provides individual controls for each player.

preferences.name: playerctl-players
preferences.title: Playerctl Players
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of players to show. Use '%any' for all players, or specify names like 'spotify,brave,vlc' without the quotes to filter specific players.
